    • Method Detail

      • getQuery

        public static org.hibernate.Query getQuery(org.hibernate.Session session,
                                           String mainQuery,
                                           ResultSpecification filterSpecification,
                                           Object... params)
        Get a query
        Parameters:
        session - the session
        mainQuery - the main query string
        filterSpecification - the filter specification
        params - the parameters
        Returns:
        the configured query

      • queryAsPageableList

        public static <I> PageableList<I> queryAsPageableList(org.hibernate.Query query,
                                                      ResultSpecification resultSpecification,
                                                      boolean logPerformance)
        Execute the query and also retrieve the overall count to successfully build the pageable list
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of the item (anyway no check will be done)
        Parameters:
        query - the configured query to execute
        resultSpecification - the ResultSpecification containing offset and overall count
        logPerformance - true if the performance should be logged
        Returns:
        the pageable list with the result values
